ygData.subject: Re: Survey Results
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrm, Even tho im totally fed up with this thread ill do one last post on the matter. it seems to me that we arent the first to try and run these ideas by
ygData.messageBody:
Hrm,

Even tho im totally fed up with this thread ill do one last post on the
matter.

it seems to me that we arent the first to try and run these ideas by verant.
I know they like user feedback but i seriously doubt they will implement
either of those ideas. I mean how are they going to make up for a level 50
warrior (ir 43 in my case) Are they just going to BOOM all my skills are up
and stuff? I dont think so. I hate to say this folks but your ideas arent
going to get past the drawing board.

P.S They are good ideas tho , dont get me wrong.

Lothaniel/Rayne

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 1:52 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Survey Results
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> Gentlemen and ladies,
>
> The final recommendation from warriors_eq@onelist.com (128 members)
> is two
> enhancements for the warrior class:
>
> 1) Increase the cap on combat abilities (1H slashing, 2H slashing,
> dodge,
> parry, riposte, dual wield, double attack) from 200 to 255.
>
> 2) Allow weapon skill specialization along the same lines as magic
> users.
> This would allow a warrior to specialize in one type of weapon for reduced
>
> delay and increased damage.
>
> Please include this as feedback every night for the next few weeks while
> you
> play the game. Post it on any and all message boards you can find and
> pass
> it on to your friends. Let's send the same message to Verant, if they see
> a
> large number of people with the same suggested improvements they may just
> make it happen.
>
>
> For the Honor and or May the blessings of
> Glory of Rallos Zek; Tunare be with you;
>
> Patty of Halas Patty Treehugger
> Barbarian Warrior Princess Half Elf Ranger
> username: Patricia username: Patty
> server: Bristlebane server: Bristlebane
>
>
